name: Monsters War Saga - Eat Them All
name_original: Monsters War Saga - Eat Them All
description:
Monsters War - The object of this war is simple: become the biggest monster by eating all other players!
Control your tiny monster who needs to evolve to absorb dots placed throughout the game or fuse smaller palyers! Eat monsters that are smaller than you and you’ll keep growing to consume them all. But watch out: players bigger than you will be trying to make you their lunch, so avoid them as soon as you meet . Eat or be eaten, winner will eventually come out of the greedy foodies.
Monsters War Saga is based on Agar.io and original 'Spore' principles.
Game Features:
- A Multiplayer Hit!Divide&Conquer!
- Scores Leaderboard
- Different Skins for your Character
- Cool Music
